titleStmt.title: The ascent to the mount of vision where many things were shewn, concerning I. The first resurrection; II. The state of separated souls; III. The patriarchal life; IV. The kingdom of Christ: with an account of the approaching blessed state of this nation.
titleStmt.author: Lead, Jane, 1623-1704.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Lambeth Palace Library.
